title: I'm A Celebrity: Danny Miller crowned 2021 winner
description: This is the second consecutive year the series has been held in Gwrych Castle in Wales.

title: Vladimir Putin: I moonlighted as a taxi driver in the 1990s
description: Russia's president says he had to top up his income during economic troubles when the USSR collapsed.

title: Kentucky tornadoes: 100-year-old church destroyed in seconds
description: The BBC's Nomia Iqbal shows us the ruins of the Mayfield First United Methodist Church in Kentucky.

title: Who put Newcastle to the sword & who else is in Garth Crooks' team of the week?
description: Which player is making their side look better than they really are? Who showed nerves of steel? And who needs imagination in the January transfer window? Find out in Garth Crooks' team of the week.

title: Mercedes F1 set to appeal after protests rejected
description: Formula 1 officials reject two protests by Mercedes against the result of the controversial title-deciding Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.

title: Max Verstappen: Formula 1's 'bull fighter' & the family that shaped him
description: Max Verstappen was born to be an F1 driver - both his parents were racers. But his father effectively programmed him as one, too.

title: Covid: First people in UK hospitals with Omicron variant
description: The variant accounts for a third of infections in London, Education Secretary Nadhim Zahawi says.

title: Russia Ukraine: Massive consequences if Moscow invades, G7 says
description: Moscow is amassing troops on Ukraine's border, but President Putin insists they pose no threat.

title: PM Boris Johnson took part in No 10 Christmas quiz last year
description: It was held while indoor mixing was banned, but Downing Street says Boris Johnson took part virtually.

title: Indian PM's Twitter hacked with bitcoin tweet
description: The Indian prime minister's account had a message stating that bitcoin would be distributed to citizens.

title: Instagram influencer received 'hundreds' of obscene photos
description: Podcaster Jess Davies is among those who want to see cyber-flashing criminalised.

title: Anne Rice, author of Interview with the Vampire, dies aged 80
description: The American author was best known for her 1976 gothic novel Interview with the Vampire.

title: Murder charge after Kenton house stab death
description: Tony Nichols was found with a stab wound and died in hospital.

title: Haas driver Mazepin misses Abu Dhabi GP after positive Covid test
description: Haas driver Nikita Mazepin tests positive for Covid-19 but will not have a "wider impact" on the title-deciding Abu Dhabi GP, says Formula 1.

title: Covid booster jabs extended to over-30s from Monday
description: The move comes as experts say the UK faces a substantial wave of Omicron without further restrictions.

title: Storybook reindeer helps kids with brain injuries
description: A new children's book is helping families raise awareness about the effects of brain injuries.

title: Kentucky tornadoes: Desperate search for survivors as death toll rises
description: At least 83 people are dead, many more are missing and entire towns have been destroyed.

title: Chesterfield boys shave heads to support friend with cancer
description: The boys, who are all Year 9 pupils, are raising money for the Teenage Cancer Trust.

title: The papers: 'Make or break week' for PM as quiz photo surfaces
description: Christmas "Partygate" and a potential revolt by MPs against more Covid rules make Sunday's front pages.

title: Storm Arwen: Why power cuts left people unable to phone for help
description: People with new digital phone lines were unable to call for help during the Storm Arwen power cuts.

title: The Nigerian woman whose life changed when she visited a leprosy colony
description: A Nigerian woman living in the US never imagined that leprosy still existed in her home country.

title: The priests navigating Colombia's conflict zones
description: Catholic clergy are sometimes the only ones who can access areas where armed groups are active.

title: The technology helping keep women safe on the streets
description: There are plenty of apps which can make women feel safer on a night out.

title: Meth and heroin fuel Afghanistan drugs boom
description: With a collapsing economy and severe drought, Afghanistan’s drug trade is on the rise.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'misty mornings'
description: A selection of striking images from our readers around the world.

title: ICYMI: House breaks Christmas tree world record
description: Record-breaking decorations you have to see to believe and other festive stories you may have missed.

title: Mexico truck crash: 'I woke up 50 metres from the truck'
description: A survivor of a crash that killed 54 speaks to the BBC about the people who did not survive.

title: 'My hand was saved by stitching it to my chest'
description: Martin Shaw thought he would lose his hand after he severely injured it in a car crash.
